00039 // 1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128 or 256 bytes are allowed buffer sizes
00040 
00041 #define TWI_RX_BUFFER_SIZE  (16)
00042 #define TWI_RX_BUFFER_MASK ( TWI_RX_BUFFER_SIZE - 1 )
00043 
00044 #if ( TWI_RX_BUFFER_SIZE & TWI_RX_BUFFER_MASK )
00045         #error TWI RX buffer size is not a power of 2
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 // 1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128 or 256 bytes are allowed buffer sizes
00049 
00050 #define TWI_TX_BUFFER_SIZE  (16)
00051 #define TWI_TX_BUFFER_MASK ( TWI_TX_BUFFER_SIZE - 1 )
00052 
00053 #if ( TWI_TX_BUFFER_SIZE & TWI_TX_BUFFER_MASK )
00054         #error TWI TX buffer size is not a power of 2
00055 #endif

00059 #define USI_SLAVE_CHECK_ADDRESS                (0x00)
00060 #define USI_SLAVE_SEND_DATA                    (0x01)
00061 #define USI_SLAVE_REQUEST_REPLY_FROM_SEND_DATA (0x02)
00062 #define USI_SLAVE_CHECK_REPLY_FROM_SEND_DATA   (0x03)
00063 #define USI_SLAVE_REQUEST_DATA                 (0x04)
00064 #define USI_SLAVE_GET_DATA_AND_SEND_ACK        (0x05)

00136 
00138 #define SET_USI_TO_SEND_ACK()                                                                                 \
00139 {                                                                                                             \
00140         USIDR    =  0;                                              /* Prepare ACK                         */ \
00141         DDR_USI |=  (1<<PORT_USI_SDA);                              /* Set SDA as output                   */ \
00142         USISR    =  (0<<USI_START_COND_INT)|(1<<USIOIF)|(1<<USIPF)|(1<<USIDC)|  /* Clear all flags, except Start Cond  */ \
00143                     (0x0E<<USICNT0);                                /* set USI counter to shift 1 bit. */ \
00144 }
00145 
00146 #define SET_USI_TO_READ_ACK()                                                                                 \
00147 {                                                                                                             \
00148         DDR_USI &=  ~(1<<PORT_USI_SDA);                             /* Set SDA as intput */                   \
00149         USIDR    =  0;                                              /* Prepare ACK        */                  \
00150         USISR    =  (0<<USI_START_COND_INT)|(1<<USIOIF)|(1<<USIPF)|(1<<USIDC)|  /* Clear all flags, except Start Cond  */ \
00151                     (0x0E<<USICNT0);                                /* set USI counter to shift 1 bit. */ \
00152 }
00153 
00154 #define SET_USI_TO_TWI_START_CONDITION_MODE()                                                                                     \
00155 {                                                                                                                                 \
00156   USICR    =  (1<<USISIE)|(0<<USIOIE)|                        /* Enable Start Condition Interrupt. Disable Overflow Interrupt.*/  \
00157               (1<<USIWM1)|(0<<USIWM0)|                        /* Set USI in Two-wire mode. No USI Counter overflow hold.      */  \
00158               (1<<USICS1)|(0<<USICS0)|(0<<USICLK)|            /* Shift Register Clock Source = External, positive edge        */  \
00159               (0<<USITC);                                                                                                         \
00160   USISR    =  (0<<USI_START_COND_INT)|(1<<USIOIF)|(1<<USIPF)|(1<<USIDC)|  /* Clear all flags, except Start Cond                            */ \
00161               (0x0<<USICNT0);                                                                                                     \
00162 }
00163 
00164 #define SET_USI_TO_SEND_DATA()                                                                               \
00165 {                                                                                                            \
00166     DDR_USI |=  (1<<PORT_USI_SDA);                                  /* Set SDA as output                  */ \
00167     USISR    =  (0<<USI_START_COND_INT)|(1<<USIOIF)|(1<<USIPF)|(1<<USIDC)|      /* Clear all flags, except Start Cond */ \
00168                 (0x0<<USICNT0);                                     /* set USI to shift out 8 bits        */ \
00169 }
00170 
00171 #define SET_USI_TO_READ_DATA()                                                                               \
00172 {                                                                                                            \
00173     DDR_USI &= ~(1<<PORT_USI_SDA);                                  /* Set SDA as input                   */ \
00174     USISR    =  (0<<USI_START_COND_INT)|(1<<USIOIF)|(1<<USIPF)|(1<<USIDC)|      /* Clear all flags, except Start Cond */ \
00175                 (0x0<<USICNT0);                                     /* set USI to shift out 8 bits        */ \
00176 }
